text: Within 3 days after the Mayor's receipt of the transcript of proceedings relating to the issuance of the bonds, the Mayor shall transmit a copy of the transcript to the Secretary to the Council.
historical:
Temporary Addition of Section

Section 110 of D.C. Law 18-156 added a section to read as follows:

"Sec. 110. Information reporting.

"Within 3 days after the Mayor's receipt of the transcript of proceedings relating to the issuance of the bonds, the Mayor shall transmit a copy of the transcript to the Secretary to the Council."

Section 402(b) of D.C. Law 18-156 provides that the act shall expire after 225 days of its having taken effect.

Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 110 of Energy Efficiency Emergency Act of 2009 (D.C. Act 18-324, March 1, 2010, 57 DCR 1851).

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 18-183, see notes following ยง 8-1778.01.

DC CODE ยง 8-1778.29

Current through December 11, 2012
